    Reference

    Fitting the Cauchy Process

    Functions to fit the Cauchy process.

    fitCauchy()

    Model fitting for a Cauchy Process

    vcov(<cauphyfit>) logLik(<cauphyfit>) AIC(<logLik.cauphyfit>) AIC(<cauphyfit>) confint(<cauphyfit>) coef(<cauphyfit>)

    Generic Methods for S3 class cauphyfit.

    profile(<cauphyfit>)

    Method for Profiling cauphyfit Objects

    plot(<profile.cauphyfit>)

    Plot for class profile.cauphyfit

    compute_vcov()

    Compute Approximated Variance Covariance Matrix

    Ancestral Reconstruction

    Functions to perform ancestral state and increment reconstruction.

    ancestral()

    Posterior density of a node

    increment()

    Posterior density of an increment

    plot(<ancestralCauchy>)

    Plot for class ancestralCauchy

    plot_asr()

    Plot Ancestral States Reconstructions

    Simulation

    Function to simulate a Cauchy process.

    rTraitCauchy()

    Cauchy Trait Simulation

    Cauchy Phylogenetic Regression

    Functions to fit a Cauchy Process phylogenetic regression.

    cauphylm()

    Phylogenetic Regression using a Cauchy Process

    vcov(<cauphylm>) logLik(<cauphylm>) AIC(<logLik.cauphylm>) AIC(<cauphylm>) predict(<cauphylm>) confint(<cauphylm>) coef(<cauphylm>)

    Generic Methods for S3 class cauphylm.

    Log Density of a Cauchy Process
